description:
Deep within ancient ruins, Captain Cat Tama takes possession of a statue of the legendary White Dog. But, as he and his crew sail away, they are attacked by the Demon King Bull`s minions. They lose their ship and the statue sinks into the sea. This is a special, extra story that takes the hero Captain Cat Tama and his friends on an epic adventure over land, sea, and sky!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キャプテンキャット★タマ
